Text: Huron Regional Airport (IATA: HON, ICAO: KHON, FAA LID: HON) is a city owned public airport in Huron, within Beadle County, South Dakota.

Triplets:<Huron Regional Airport
2:
--------------------
Text: Huron Regional Airport:  The airport serves as a backup site for Sioux Falls Regional Airport.
